<script type="text/javascript">
		  
				alert("歡迎使用二代雲");
		  
      function ChangeDisabled(value){
　if(value=='1'){
 var strA = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MAxYcyGdJxwN8yJlUj4u9kypTO6gyzqpXlagb4xUBhg/gviz/tq?tqx=out:html&tq=select%20D,%20H%20where%20H%20contains%20%27";
var strB = TetstText.value;
  var strC = "%27%20order%20by%20D";
　open(strA.concat(strB).concat(strC));
　}else{
　}
}
		</script>
     <input type="text" id="TetstText">
<input type="button" value='查詢購買的客戶' onclick="ChangeDisabled(1)">
